thread.title: Buddy Guy winter residency at Legends a hot ticket
thread.title_full: Buddy Guy winter residency at Legends a hot ticket

author: Miriam Di Nunzio
title: Buddy Guy winter residency at Legends a hot ticket
text:
Buddy Guy performs at his Legends club in January 2014. | ANTHONY MOSER PHOTO Buddy Guy winter residency at Legends a hot ticket Miriam Di Nunzio on October 22, 2015 
Chicago iconm, Rock and Roll Hall of Famer and six-time Grammy-winner Buddy Guy returns for his annual January residency at his South Loop club (700 S. Wabash) for 16 shows (Thursdays through Sundays), Jan. 7 through Jan. 31, 2016. 
General admission tickets, $55-$65, will go on sale at 10 a.m. Oct. 31 at buddyguy.com All shows are 21+over. The shows will also be live-streamed at BuddyGuy.TV for a $5 fee. 
Guy, 79, released his latest album, “Born To Play Guitar” (Silvertone/RCA) earlier this year. He received a Lifetime Achievement Award at the Grammys in February. 
Visit www.buddyguy.com for show times and other club policies.
